heading: Quartets.
general-note: Here are entered collections of compositions for four instruments belonging to various families and in various combinations. Collections of compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for a single combination of four instruments, and individual works, are entered under this heading followed by a parenthetical qualifier with the names of the instruments or the term "unspecified instrument(s).".

Compositions not in a specific form or of a specific type for four bowed stringed instruments are entered under. String quartets;. for four wind instruments under. Wind quartets;. for four brass instruments under. Brass quartets;. for four woodwind instruments under. Woodwind quartets;. and for four plucked stringed instruments under. Plucked instrument quartets..
Compositions for piano, violin, viola and cello are entered under. Piano quartets..
Compositions for four percussionists are entered under. Percussion ensembles..
Compositions for four solo voices are entered under. Sacred vocal quartets. or. Vocal quartets..
